description: The Charger Insulated Flannel is your go-to for any mountain activity. With a durable and breathable wicking fabric package built in, this is a versatile piece meant to be used for any kind of adventure. A perfect layering piece while also warm enough to wear enough to wear on its own, the Charger Insulated Flannel is a multi-season masterpiece.
name: Dakine Charger Insulated Flannel Shirt - Unisex
